title: A Place of Her Own
description: Fifteen years old and an orphan - When her parents die, Stina must leave her country home to live in the city with her older sister. She loves her sister and brother-in-law, but there's really no room in their tiny apartment. How can Stina keep up with the homework in her new school, or invite friends over? And then there's the awful loneliness that won't go away. Stina feels like giving up - until one wonderful day...
author: Ann Mari Falk
